main.*:
[[File:Kori Weston.png|thumb|Kori Weston]]
'''Kori Weston''' is a woman that comes to [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' fake funeral service in "[[The One With The Memorial Service]]". She is played by [[Ivana Milicevic]].

After [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] wrote to the entire college that Ross died when he got hit by a blimp, Kori Weston showed up to the fake memorial service. It turns out that she had a crush on Ross. Ross, hearing that, came out of the room and announced that he is not dead. She left saying that he was a freak and that she regrets having a crush on him.
